function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Emergence of new variants of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Challenges the efficacies of current vaccines and drugs","Mitigation":"Development of broad-spectrum antiviral drugs and universal vaccines","Technologies":"Genomic surveillance and database development","People":"Public, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Global health organizations, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Lack of detailed viral surveillance at the genomic level","Impact":"Inability to trace the origin of potential novel human-infecting coronaviruses","Mitigation":"Guarantee annual surveillance of coronaviruses in humans, animals, and the environment, and combine genomic sequence information as a database","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, surveillance technology","People":"Public health agencies, researchers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of mutation and evolution of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Inability to predict and control the spread of new variants","Mitigation":"Systematic study of COVID-19 and potential emerging infectious pathogens","Technologies":"Functional studies, systematic study methods","People":"Public health agencies, researchers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
